feed.title: ZaneOps Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug fixes

  • fix: bug with service metrics not collected correctly by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/383

Other changes

  • chore: use v1 for the default version instead of v1.0 by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/382

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor: Some user experience changes by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/387

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor: updating from elasticsearch to loki by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/380

[!WARNING] This is a breaking change release, to update, you can do this : shell curl https://cdn.zaneops.dev/makefile > Makefile make setup make deploy

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.0.3...v1.6

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: include loki-config in setup and fix delete script by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/392
  • fix: do not run monitoring healthcheck against non production deployments by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/393

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.6...v1.6.1

entry.title: New release for ZaneOps: v1.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug fixes

  • fix: metrics collection workflow failing when disk I/O is None by @Fredkiss3 in https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/pull/395

Full Changelog: https://github.com/zane-ops/zane-ops/compare/v1.6.1...v1.6.2
